amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the payments in lieu of taxes (PILT) program by $15 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the funding for the payments in lieu of taxes (PILT) program by $15 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 332 (Roll no. 255).
